verses.content: Mâichâm bula ngîrin Lalpa chu ka hmuh a, chun, ama chun, “Kawtkhâr bulhai an inhnîng theina dingin a sîp bâwkhai chu vaw la, an rênga lu chungah suknâwi vawng rawh; chun, a thi mahlahai chu kâwlhnâmin that ka ta, pakhat khawm tlân hmang naw ni hai a, pakhat khawma pumpel naw bawk an tih.
Mithi khuo chenin cho tlang hai sien khawm, chutaka inthawk chun ka kutin la suok ka ta, vânah lâwn hai sien khawm, chutaka inthawk chun hnûk thlâng ka tih.

Karmel tlâng sîpah inbihmang hai sien khawm, zawng ka ta, chutaka inthawk chun anni chu la thlâng ka tih; chun, tuisuoriet mawngah ka mithmu nawah inbihmang hai sien khawm, chutaka rûl chu thu pêng ka ta, anni chu chuk a tih.
An hmêlmahai hmaah salah fe hai sien khawm, chutaka kâwlhnâm chu thu pêng ka ta, anni chu sât hlum a tih, ṭhatna ni loin, ṭhat nawna dingin an chungah ka mit infûktir ka tih,”
Ram chu tâwk a, suktuiraltu chu Lalpa, sipaihai PATHIEN chu a ni sih a; chun, chutaka um po pohai chu lungngai an tih; chun, Vadung angin hung lien a ta, Aigupta Vadung angin kang nâwk a tih;
vâna a pindanhai siem a, hnuoi chunga pindan inkuol siem a, tui- suoriet tuihai ko a, hnuoi chunga bunthlatu, a hming chu LALPA a nih.

LALPA chun, “Aw Israel nauhai, ka chungah Ethiopia nauhai angin in um naw am a nih? Aigupta rama inthawka Israel le Kaphtor rama inthawk Philistin mihai le Kir rama inthawka Suria mihai ka ṭhuoi suok nâwm a nih?
Ngai ta u, Lalpa PATHIEN mit chu ram suol chungah a fuh a; chun, hnuoi chunga inthawkin sukbo ka ta; amiruokchu, Jakob sûngkuohai chu sukse vawng naw ning,” a ta.
“Ngai ta u, thu ka pêk ding a ni sih a, chun, sihria bu an rel angin, Israel sûngkuohai chu hnam po po lai chun rel ka tih; nisienlakhawm, a mal chîn tak khawm hnuoi chungah tla naw ni.
Ka mihai mi suol po po, ‘Ṭhat nawna chun mi hnawt phâk naw nih a, mi nang bawk naw ni,’ tihai chu kâwlhnâmin thîng an tih.
“Chu nia chun David bâwktê chim chu inngîr ka ta, a âwnghai chu phâwk ka ta, a sietnahai chu rem nâwk ka ta; tienlaia a um ang khan bâwl ka tih,
Edom hmuna la umhai le ka hminga ko hnam po po hai chu an nei theina dingin,” LALPA hi thil thawtu hin a tih.

LALPA chun, “Ngai ta u, nihai chu a hung tlung a ni tah, chuong nihaia chun hnuoi inlettu chun bu âttu chu hnawt phâk a ta, grêp chîltu chun chi thetu chu la hnawt phâk a ta; tlâng insâng chun uoin thlum infartir a ta, tlâng po po chu intui an tih.

Chun, ka mi Israelhai chu sala inthawkin ṭhuoi kîr nâwk ka ta; khaw ṭâwphai chu siem nâwk an ta, hluong an tih; chun, grêp huonhai siem an ta, a uoin dâwn an tih; huonhai khawm siem an ta, a ra chu fâng an tih.
An ramah anni chu phun ka ta, an kuoma ka pêk an rama in- thawk phawidawkin um nâwk ta naw ni hai,” LALPA i Pathien chun a tih.
